infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Bettaga uses the location to allow you to setup your store locations.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Bettaga will use tracking for analytics and App improvement purposes only. Data and tracking are not linked by user.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Bettaga accesses your photos to let you upload your brand logo to customize your digital card.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Bettaga needs an access to your camera to allow you to SCAN Barcodes from your customer's Wallet passes. Allow if you like to SCAN Customers / Members Passes.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Bettaga accesses your photos to let you upload your brand logo to customize your digital card.
